sentence.Network_en: Nevertheless, comrades, we Communists are known for our dauntlessness before difficulties.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是, 同志们, 我们共产党人是以不怕困难著名的.

list.abs: facing peril and death with dauntless heart ,, 直面险恶和死亡 , 毫无惧色,
And chant thy dauntless slogan - song ., 并唱起你英勇的战歌.
the frightened sailors wanted to turn back , but their dauntless leader urged them to sail on .受惊的水手们想掉头回去，但他们勇敢的领导却激励他们继续航行。
Dauntless 勇敢的; 无畏的dauntless bravery 英勇绝伦Deadlock 僵局
